LanguageData.AF_RE_Ferian_Sydaily_Frist.label: Sydaily Crystal[I]
LanguageData.AF_RE_Ferian_Sydaily_Frist.discoveredLet: As soon as we recharge even one of the Sydaliy Crystals,. \n\nThese aliens can't bully us anymore!
LanguageData.AF_RE_Ferian_Sydaily_Second.label: Sydaily Crystal[II]
LanguageData.AF_RE_Ferian_Sydaily_Second.discoveredLe: Sydaily Crystal can transform other thing into Sydaily Crystal in the blink of an eye. \n\nIn other words,It's a kind of inexhaustible energy in theory!
LanguageData.AF_RE_Ferian_Sydaily_Third.label: Sydaily Crystal[III]
LanguageData.AF_RE_Ferian_Sydaily_Third.description: The research findings of Sydaily crystal is build on the thousands of generations of Ferian. \n\nThere's no way we can do this on our own...
LanguageData.AF_RE_Ferian_Sydaily_Third.discoveredLet: It's a pretty hard work to understand the older generations blueprint~
